name: Bullets For Hell
description:
Scene: Armageddon, end of days, judgement day, you, the gun tower of guns and infinite  demons!

Demons spill out of the gates of hell. Its only a matter of time til humankind is overrun!

Its on you to give your fellow sinners a bit more time on our precious earth. So get on the gun tower of guns and shoot as many demons as you can before your time comes. With every dropped demon you get the energy needed to enhance your gun tower massively with even more guns!

MORE DEMONS
MORE GUNS
MORE SHOOTING DEMONS

Controls

Strafe
Pull Energy
Up and Down
Speed up strafe
Camera Up and DownA and D
Hold Left Mouse
W and S or Mousehweel
Hold Shift
Mouse

Toggle Fullscreen: Alt + Enter
Toggle Music: M
Exit: Alt + F4

(No need to press a shooty button, its automatically pressing for you)
